Claim: "A man in a white t-shirt does a trick with a bronze colored yo-yo."
Implication: "There is a tricky male making fools of other people."
Referring expressions: A man in a white t-shirt, bronze colored yo-yo  There is a tricky male, other people.
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsInWhiteTShirt(a) and DoesTrick(a,b))) & (forall e (forall f (  DoesTrick(e) ->  IsTricky(f)))) & (forall h (forall g (  DoesTrick(g) ->   MakesFoolsOf(h))))) -> (exists c (exists d (IsTricky(c) and MakesFoolsOf(d))))
